explains: v. 编，织；（用……）编成；编造（故事等）；迂回行进（weave的现在分词）

sentences.en: She is skilled at spinning and weaving.
Weaving and knitting are traditional cottage industries.
sentences.cn: 编织和针织是传统的家庭手工业。

sentences.en: Originally, silkworm farming was solely restricted to women, and it was they who were responsible for the growing, harvesting and weaving.
sentences.cn: 最初，养蚕只是妇女的工作，她们负责养蚕、收割和织布。
